com.sun.spot.security.implementation
Class RSAPublicKey

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.spot.security.implementation.RSAKey
      com.sun.spot.security.implementation.RSAPublicKey
All Implemented Interfaces:
Key, PublicKey
public final class RSAPublicKey
extends RSAKey
implements PublicKey

Specifies the RSA public key interface. An RSA key is not ready for us until both the modulus and exponent have been set.

Constructor Detail

RSAPublicKey

public RSAPublicKey(byte[] modulus,
                    byte[] exponent)
Constructor for RSA public key.

Parameters:
modulus - modulus of key to process
exponent - exponent the key

RSAPublicKey

public RSAPublicKey(byte[] modulus,
                    int modOffset,
                    int modLen,
                    byte[] exponent,
                    int expOffset,
                    int expLen)
Constructor for RSA public key.

Parameters:
modulus - modulus of key to process
modOffset - offset of the modulus
modLen - length of modulus in bytes
exponent - exponent the key
expOffset - offset of the exponent
expLen - length of the exponent in bytes
